scene1.text: You've just arrived in the city of Neon Vista in Neo-Tokyo 2087...curious about a city that never powers down. The magnetic high speed train hisses to a stop, and you step onto the platform with your holo-briefcase. Towering digital billboards cast colorful shadows. A friendly local notices you looking around...

A.text: Ask about the vibrant Pulse District with the sky-high floating clubs

B.text: Ask about the quiet Haven Heights in the bio-dome district away from Neon

scene2.text: Following their advice, you decide to head to {{location}}. As you approach the {{accommodation}}, your neural implant reminds you it's dinnertime, and you notice...

A.text: A cozy retro-cafe with real books and analog coffee machines...

B.text: A sky-high rooftop bar where holographic bartenders serve glowing cocktails...
